title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover

Keep your pet safe and comfortable, indoors or outdoors, with a simple, sturdy pen that’s easy to use.

What it is:
- A strong, metal playpen for dogs and other small animals like chickens, rabbits, and ducks.
- Size: about 4 feet by 4 feet wide and 4.4 feet tall. Fits nicely on a patio, in a yard, garage, or large room.

Easy to use:
- Quick to set up: panels connect easily with simple assembly. No special tools needed.
- Two sizes available: Small or Large, so you can choose what fits your space.

Safe and sturdy:
- Made from galvanized metal with a paint-coated finish to fight rust.
- Smooth edges with no sharp parts, gentle for both pets and hands.
- Strong swing gate with secure latches, so pets stay inside and you can enter safely.

Weather-ready cover:
- Includes a 210D Oxford cloth cover.
- Helps block sun, wind, and rain to keep pets comfortable.
- Provides shade on hot days and protection during light weather.

Comfort for pets:
- Open-wire design allows fresh air to flow through.
- Works well indoors and outdoors.

Good to know:
- Suitable for dogs and other small animals.
- Rust-resistant metal means it lasts longer outside.
- Simple gate latch is easy to open and close.

In short: This BingoPaw Playpen is a solid, easy-to-assemble kennel with a protective cover. It keeps your pet safe, shaded, and comfortable, and it’s simple to use and clean. A dependable choice for everyday peace of mind.
